channel.title: [C4D]Project Twisted Metal
channel.description: This is gonna be a project of long lasting effort, im gonna keep trying out different things and multiplying bits and so on and so forth, this is the first one, V1 if you like. [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/twistedMetal.png[/img] Its just, twisted and bent in a few places and a candle light which i think i might change but we'll see

item.title: [C4D]Project Twisted Metal
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

If you’re going to keep trying new things, would you mind not making a new thread for each one?

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D]Project Twisted Metal
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Your just making spheres and slapping textures on them and constantly making new posts… Why dont you try some basic modeling tutorials?

Start with this one and maybe change your crystal ball post to it, So you can get CC going towards something that isn’t a sphere on wood.

http://www.zymic.com/tutorials/cinema-4d/wine-glass/

Btw, why dont you take a bunch of those cubes and interlace them? It will look more twisted.

Read full topic
